create

public static DataService create(java.lang.String dbName,
                                 java.lang.String serverAddr,
                                 java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String password)
Creates an instance of DataService connected to the specified database service. Returns null if a connection cannot be made. Don't forget to close the connection after you're done!

Parameters:
dbName - example:test
serverAddr - example:localhost:3306
username - example:testuser
password - example:test623
Returns:
An instance of DataService with an active connection. null if can't connect

Description copied from interface: DataService
Adds a patient to the database. Adds a new patient with a new PatID is PatID is null in the DTO, otherwise, it overwrites whatever had the PatID last.
